title: Software Engineering Program Manager (AI/ML/Algorithms)
summary: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new insights have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, & customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish. Dynamic, resourceful people and inspiring, innovative technologies are the norm here. The people who work here have reinvented entire industries with all Apple Hardware products. The same passion for innovation that goes into our products also applies to our practices strengthening our dedication to leave the world better than we found it. Do you want to join us in these pursuits? Join us to help deliver the next groundbreaking Apple products! Apple is seeking a Software Engineering Program Manager with Computer Vision (CV)/ML/Algorithm experience to join the Video Computer Vision team which delivered Vision Pro and FaceID algorithms! The ideal candidate would grasp and drive complex technical topics and lead a hardworking engineering team during its product development phases. We are looking for a SW EPM with proven algorithm experience and a strong software background. The ideal candidate has gone through entire product cycles and has a variety of different experiences. You should have a solid track record of shipping complex new technology and experience in building algorithms. The ideal candidate thrives in a dynamic, constantly evolving environment. You will lead teams through the software development cycle from concept to delivery, collaborating with several teams and driving the definition, schedule, execution and communication of new features. If this sounds like you, please apply!
description: In this role, you will drive large, multi-functional efforts to build technologies for Apple and have the opportunity to work on cutting edge technologies using Computer Vision, Machine Learning and Generative AI. You will create development schedules, identify critical paths, and maintain thorough execution You will ensure tight inter-team coordination and communication. You should be able to grasp complex technical topics and abstract key issues and risks into a useful form for executive management. Optimally and consistently communicate overall program status.
preferred_qualifications: Technical program management experience managing consumer-facing software programs. Serious consideration will be given to qualified candidates from computer vision fields with relevant software engineering, product development experience and data science background. Previous experience with Hardware process and Embedded Software Systems is a plus. Strong knowledge of software development processes. Ability to dive into technical details in Machine Learning, Computer Vision and other algorithms. Comprehends and deals well with rapid changes and remains flexible and calm in the face of uncertainty. Excellent communication, presentation, organizational, and leadership skills. Ability to influence, lead and mitigate risks. Self-motivated and proactive with demonstrated creative and critical thinking capabilities.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $165,500 and $293,800, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs. Apple employees are eligible for discretionary restricted stock unit awards, and can purchase Apple stock at a discount if voluntarily participating in Apple’s Employee Stock Purchase Plan. You’ll also receive benefits including: Comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, a range of discounted products and free services, and for formal education related to advancing your career at Apple, reimbursement for certain educational expenses — including tuition. Additionally, this role might be eligible for discretionary bonuses or commission payments as well as relocation. Learn more about Apple Benefits. Note: Apple benefit, compensation and employee stock programs are subject to eligibility requirements and other terms of the applicable plan or program.
